title: july 10: a daring rescue in thailand
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the incredible 2018 rescue of a Thai boys’ soccer team from the depths of the Tham Luang Nang Non cave in Thailand. After, Maia reflects on the groundbreaking music-recognition app, Shazam. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
